title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. To get opposite coefficients of y, multiply the first equation by 2. \\n (-3*x+y=-9)*2 \\n $$x-2y=-12$$

title: Solve for x
text: y will be eliminated and then solve for x. \\n $$-5x=-30$$ \\n $$x=6$$

title: Substitute and Solve for y
text: Substitute $$x=6$$ into one of the original equations and solve for y. \\n $$-3\times6+y=-9$$ \\n $$-18+y=-9$$ \\n $$y=9$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is (6,9).
